nodes.text: Battle of the Nazzri system  (Mandalorian Wars)

In 3962 BBY, while the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders were invading Galactic Republic territory during the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars, the two clashed in the Nazzri system located in the Mid Rim's Lantillian sector. That year, the Mandalorians undertook Mandalorian Triumph, a campaign to capture the Core World of Duro. One prong of the advance took the Mandalorian forces from their territory to the Gizer system. Once they had conquered Gizer, they moved on to the Nazzri system, which they took during the battle. After Nazzri, the Mandalorians assaulted the Zel system and continued Coreward, eventually taking a number of other worlds.
The battle in the Nazzri system was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
